servinfo.title: Acceleration or deceleration is not available by using RES/ACC or SET/COAST switch

item.ptxt: Before performing this Cruise Control System Symptom Diagnosis, perform cruise control system check referring to Cruise Control System Check:J24B and N32A Model .
Check each part in the order from the top of the following list.

condition.ptxt: Acceleration or deceleration is not available by using RES/ACC or SET/COAST switch

action.ptxt: Check RES/ACC or SET/COAST switch for function referring to Cruise Control Switch Inspection:J24B and N32A Model .
Replace after making sure that none of above parts is faulty.
